data.message: Facebook I need your help right now, my another facebook I want to use again but I forgot  my email also my password on my fb account. I tried to recover but my email there is I forgot also the pass and the email so I cant verify the code. And I dont have also number on my fb acct. so unable to recover. Facebook if there a ways how can I return my facebook back???

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Shailla. You may be able to get back into the Facebook account you are currently unable to access by answering a security question, using an alternate email address listed on your account or getting help from friends. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2fIoytF. -Joe
I still need help with my question, too. I need to send a response to a private message, and I can't right now. Is Facebook's mailbox going to work again soon?
Hi Leah. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, please report it to us here: http://bit.ly/2getnPK. -Joe

Thank you. For the past few days it seems like my mailbox hasn't wanted to work well, and I have an important message I need to reply to. It usually doesn't bother me tremendously when the mailbox doesn't work, but I need to reply to this message.

I can't get the blue arrow to bring up its menu so that I can report the problem. The menu under the lock icon that's right next to it, works fine, but I can't get the blue arrow to do anything but turn white. Is there any way you can just put "fixing the inbox" on the work order list? Please?
Is there any way my problem can be fixed within the next few days? Please? Please? Please?

Do I really have to fill out that survey that you asked for? I can't get that page to cooperate. Or is that I let you know good enough? Please help me. I'm getting more and more stressed out by this...
Hi Leah. If you're having trouble sending messages, please report it to us here: http://bit.ly/2geGLmZ. -Joe

Thank you so much for your help, Joe. I think I consider you my new best friend. :-) I managed to get the message I needed to taken care of, too. If I have any more problems with my inbox, I'll let you know. Thank you SO much, though. Have a good night!

Email:Pasword:Home:Friend:Message:Searching:Menu: all is damage facebook  shut down https://facebook.com/home.php?ref_component=mfreebasic_home_header&ref_page=%2Fwap%2Fpages_timeline.php&refid=17&__tn__=R
